===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|ja|鴨|tr1=kamo|t1=[[duck]]|の|tr2=no|pos2=possessive particle|嘴|tr3=hashi|t3=[[bill]]; [[beak]]}}. The {{m|ja|の|tr=no}} is omitted in the spelling.
